extDescription.message: Send and read user-to-user encrypted messages in Yahoo Mail.

promptDismissActionLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to dismiss the current action.

promptOkActionLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to accept the current action.

promptDecryptionSuccessMsg.description: Message informing about a successful decryption of a message.

promptMessageNotEncryptedMsg.description: Message informing that the message was not encrypted.

promptSignatureVerifyingMsg.description: Message informing that the message is being verified.

promptVerificationSuccessMsg.description: Message informing about a successful signature verification.

promptVerificationFailureMsg.message: but signatures from $1 cannot be validated
promptVerificationFailureMsg.description: Message informing about failure in signature verification.

promptEncryptSignTitle.description: A friendly title for the encrypt&sign action.

promptLoadingLabel.description: A verb notifying the user the message is being encrypted and sending.

promptEncryptSignActionLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to encrypt and/or sign a message.

promptEncryptSignInsertLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user whether to insert the encrypted/decrypted text into the page.

promptEncryptSignInsertIntoGmailLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user whether to insert the encrypted/decrypted text into Gmail.

promptEncryptSignSendLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user to send a protected message.

promptEncryptSignSaveDraftLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user to save the working draft into the visiting page.

promptEncryptSignEncryptingDraftLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user the working draft is being encrypted.

promptEncryptSignSavingDraftLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user the working draft is being saved into the visiting page.

promptEncryptSignSaveEncryptedDraftLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user the working draft is saved into the visiting page.

promptEncryptSignReplyHeader.description: A sentence fragment indicating where the original message begins.

promptDecryptVerifyTitle.description: A friendly title for the decrypt&verify action.

promptDecryptVerifyPlaceholder.message: Paste here the protected message that you would like to read.
promptDecryptVerifyPlaceholder.description: A sentence prompting the user to paste an encrypted PGP message.

promptDecryptVerifyActionLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to encrypt and/or sign a message.

promptImportKeyTitle.description: A friendly title for the key import action.

promptImportKeyActionLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to import an OpenPGP key into End-To-End.

promptImportKeyConfirmLabel.message:
Do you want to import the following keys?

You should verify (e.g. with a phone call) that the key owners displayed below use the same key fingerprints.
promptImportKeyConfirmLabel.description: A sentence asking the user to confirm the key import.

promptImportPrivateKeyConfirmLabel.message: Do you want to import the following keys?
promptImportPrivateKeyConfirmLabel.description: A sentence asking the user to confirm the key import.

promptImportKeyVerifyLabel.description: A sentence asking the user to verify all keys to import.

promptImportKeyNotificationLabel.message: The key for $1 has been imported successfully.
promptImportKeyNotificationLabel.description: A sentence confirming that the key import has completed successfully.

promptImportKeyError.description: A sentence notifying that there was an error during key import.

promptNoEncryptionTarget.message: You need to use a passphrase or choose message recipients to encrypt.
promptNoEncryptionTarget.description: A sentence notifying that user needs to chose a passphrase or recipients in order to encrypt and sign a message.

glassKeyringLockedError.message: Please unlock the KeyRing before reading messages inline. To do this, please click the Yahoo Mail Encrypted icon in the upper-right area of the screen.
glassKeyringLockedError.description: An error message indicating that the user must unlock their KeyRing before reading messages inline.

glassCannotDecrypt.message: Unable to decrypt contents. Please try unlocking the keyring and reloading the page.
glassCannotDecrypt.description: A generic error message indicating that something went wrong while reading messages inline.

glassCannotCommunicate.message: Unable to communicate with the extension launcher. Please reload the mail application.
glassCannotCommunicate.description: A generic error message indicating that something went wrong while communicating with the launcher.

actionLoading.description: A phrase inditating a loading process.

actionUserSpecified.description: A phrase prompting the user to select a PGP action.

actionUnlockKeyring.description: A short phrase prompting the user to provide the passphrase to their keyring.

actionEnterPassphrase.description: A short phrase prompting the user to provide the passphrase for a given key.

actionEnterPassphraseDescription.message: Enter the passphrase for your keyring.
actionEnterPassphraseDescription.description: A longer phrase prompting the user to provide the passphrase to their keyring.

actionConfigureExtension.description: A short phrase directing the user how to configure/manage the extension.

actionLockKeyring.description: A short phrase directing the user to lock their keyring.

actionReportIssue.description: A short phrase directing the user to support request.

actionCancelPgpAction.description: A verb prompting the user to cancel the current PGP operation.

actionBackToMenu.description: Phrase prompting user to go back to normal compose window

actionOpenMenu.description: A noun describing where the menu is located.

actionOpenPopout.description: A short phrase describing opening a new window.

actionDraftDeleteTitle.description: A short phrase describing deleting the draft.

keyMgmtTitle.description: A section title signaling that the displayed PGP keys are stored by the extension.

keyMgmtExportLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to export the selected PGP key.

keyMgmtRemoveLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to remove the selected PGP key.

keyMgmtNoneLabel.description: A noun indicating that there are no PGP keys to display.

keyMgmtSignupPromptLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user sign up with a new key.

keyMgmtImportKeyringLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to import an existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtExportKeyringLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to export the existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtBackupKeyringLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to show a code to backup their generated keys

keyMgmtBackupKeyringCaseSensitive.description: A sentence reminding the user that backup codes are case sensitive.

keyMgmtRestoreKeyringLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to restore the keyring's ECC seed

keyMgmtOptionsLabel.description: A sentence showing the keyring options

keyMgmtHelpLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to see readme.

keyMgmtImportKeypairLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to import his own existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtUidLabel.message: $1 is ready for use with following public keys:
keyMgmtUidLabel.description: A sentence showing the user the keys

keyMgmtBackupKeyringWarning.message: Write down this code in a safe place:

keyMgmtRestoreKeyringEmailLabel.description: A word prompting the user for their email.

keyMgmtRestoreKeyringBackupCodeLabel.message: Backup Code. (Anyone who knows the code will be able to read your messages.)
keyMgmtRestoreKeyringBackupCodeLabel.description: A word prompting the user for their backup code.

keyMgmtChangePassphraseLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to change the passphrase of the existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtAddPassphraseLabel.message: Encrypt local keyring with a passphrase
keyMgmtAddPassphraseLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to change the passphrase of the existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtChangePassphrasePlaceholder.message: Enter a new passphrase for the existing keyring.
keyMgmtChangePassphrasePlaceholder.description: A sentence prompting the user to enter a new passphrase for the existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtConfirmPassphrasePlaceholder.message: Confirm the new passphrase for the existing keyring.
keyMgmtConfirmPassphrasePlaceholder.description: A sentence prompting the user to confirm the new passphrase for the existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtPassphraseMismatchLabel.message: The provided passphrases did not match!
keyMgmtPassphraseMismatchLabel.description: A sentence describing that the provided passphrases do not match.

keyMgmtChangePassphraseActionLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to change the passphrase of the existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtConfirmPassphraseActionLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to confirm the new passphrase of the existing PGP keyring.

keyMgmtChangePassphraseSuccessMsg.message: Successfully changed the passphrase for the existing keyring!
keyMgmtChangePassphraseSuccessMsg.description: A sentence confirming that the user has successfully changed the keyring's passphrase.

moreOptionsLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to visit the advanced options page.

fewerOptionsLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to visit the simplified options page.

keyMgmtFbImportLabel.description: A sentence prompting the user to import a key from Facebook.

keyMgmtFbImport.message: Enter someone's Facebook username to import their key from Facebook:
keyMgmtFbImport.description: A sentence telling the user how to import a key from Facebook.

keyMgmtFbFail.description: Indicates that no FB key exists for the user.

keyMgmtFbInvalid.description: Ask the user to enter a valid username.

genKeyTitle.description: A section title indicating where the user can generate a new PGP key.

genKeyEmailLabel.message:
A key pair is required for encrypting emails to and from #email#your email address#.
Click below to create a key pair. Or you can #import#import a key pair#.
genKeyEmailLabel.description: A sentence fragment prompting the user to sign up.

genKeyPassphraseLabel.description: A noun indicating where the user needs to specify a passphrase for her new PGP key.

genKeyGenerateButtonLabel.description: A verb prompting the user to register to receive secret messages.

settingsTitle.description: A page title indicating to the user that the current page will allow her to modify the extension's settings.

settingsKeyringLockedError.message: Please unlock the KeyRing or set an initial KeyRing passphrase before using the Options page. To do this, please click the lock icon in the upper-right area of the screen.
settingsKeyringLockedError.description: An error message indicating that the user must unlock their KeyRing and/or choose an initial passphrase for the KeyRing before using the Options page.

promptRecipientsPlaceholder.description: A phrase to prompt the user to enter the intended recipients of the message.

promptCCRecipientsPlaceholder.description: A phrase to prompt the user to enter the intended CC recipients of the message.

promptPassphraseEncrypt.message: Type the passphrase to your key to sign this message
promptPassphraseEncrypt.description: A sentence to prompt the user to type her passphrase during message signing.

promptPassphraseDecrypt.message: Type the passphrase to your key to decrypt this message
promptPassphraseDecrypt.description: A sentence to prompt the user to type her passphrase during message decryption.

promptPassphraseImportKey.message: Type the passphrase to your key to explicitly trust this key
promptPassphraseImportKey.description: A sentence to prompt the user to type her passphrase when importing a PGP key.

promptPassphraseCallbackMessage.description: A sentence requesting the passphrase for a PGP key.

promptNoEncryptionKeysFound.message: Please setup keys for $1 to proceed. Do it now?
promptNoEncryptionKeysFound.description: A sentence warning the user that the action cannot be completed due to missing encryption keys.

promptSignMessageAs.description: A sentence prompting the user to specify their PGP key to sign and encrypt.

promptFromLabel.description: The label to describe who is the author of the message.

promptSubjectLabel.description: The label to describe the subject of the message.

promptNoPrivateKeysFound.message: Generate or import private key(s) to sign or decrypt messages
promptNoPrivateKeysFound.description: The label to inform the user that he needs a private key to use signing/decryption functionality

promptDecryptionPassphraseMessage.message: Please enter a passphrase for this message.
promptDecryptionPassphraseMessage.description: A sentence prompting the user to specify a passphrase for symmetric decryption.

promptEncryptionPassphraseMessage.message:
Please enter a passphrase for this message.
Anyone who knows the passphrase will be able to read the message.
promptEncryptionPassphraseMessage.description: A sentence prompting the user to specify a passphrase for symmetric encryption.

promptEncryptionPassphraseConfirmMessage.message: Please confirm the passphrase for this message.
promptEncryptionPassphraseConfirmMessage.description: A sentence prompting the user to confirm the passphrase for symmetric encryption.

promptEncryptionPassphraseLink.description: A sentence notifying the user where to enter passphrases for symmetric encryption.

promptEncryptionPassphraseLinkTooltip.message: Protect the message with a passhrase. Anyone who knows the passphrase will be able to read the message.
promptEncryptionPassphraseLinkTooltip.description: A sentence notifying the user what passphrase encryption does.

promptPassphraseMask.description: The string that is displayed instead of a passphrase.

promptEncryptrBodyOnlyMessage.message: Only the message body will be encrypted.
promptEncryptrBodyOnlyMessage.description: The default encryptr status message in the encrypted compose window.

publicKeyDescription.description: Modifier before a key algorithm type for a public key.

secretKeyDescription.description: Modifier before a key algorithm type for a secret or private key.

publicSubKeyDescription.description: Modifier before a key algorithm type for a public subkey.

secretSubKeyDescription.description: Modifier before a key algorithm type for a secret or private subkey.

welcomeHeader.description: A welcome message to new users.

welcomeBasicsTitle.description: A section title, can be a sentence fragment

welcomeBasicsLine1.message: This extension allows you to create encrypted messages and decrypt encrypted messages sent to you.

welcomeBasicsLine2.message: Here's a short demonstration how you could use the extension in GMail:
welcomeBasicsLine2.description: A sentence describing a link to an instruction video or screenshot.

welcomeBasicsLine3.message: You can also use the extension in any other website where you can type text.

welcomeIframeUrl.description: Link to a demonstration on how to use the extension.

welcomeNoviceTitle.description: A section title, can be a sentence fragment

welcomeGenKeyConfirm.message: You are all set. A new OpenPGP key has been created for you to use.
welcomeGenKeyConfirm.description: The message to display when the user has created his/her OpenPGP key.

welcomeAdvancedTitle.message: I want to import a keyring
welcomeAdvancedTitle.description: A section title, can be a sentence fragment

welcomeKeyImport.message: You are all set. Your OpenPGP keyring has been imported and is ready for you to use.
welcomeKeyImport.description: The message to display when the user has imported his/her existing keyring.

welcomeAcceptanceButton.description: A short sentence fragment prompting the user to confirm that he understood the welcome instructions.

passphraseEmptyWarning.message: Unable to open keyring. Please enter your keyring's passphrase.
passphraseEmptyWarning.description: A message describing keyring access problems and prompting the user to enter passphrase.

preferencesSectionTitle.description: A section title, can be a sentence fragment

preferenceWelcomeScreen.message: Show the welcome window when the extension loads the next time.
preferenceWelcomeScreen.description: A sentence prompting the user to disable the extension's welcome window.

preferenceActionSniffing.message: Always try to anticipate End-To-End action.
preferenceActionSniffing.description: A sentence prompting the user to prevent the extension from guessing the intended actions.

preferenceLookingGlass.message: Show the decrypted text inside supported email providers when possible.
preferenceLookingGlass.description: A sentence prompting the user to enable the looking glass in supported providers.

preferenceComposeGlass.message: Default to show the secure compose for mail encryption.
preferenceComposeGlass.description: A sentence prompting the user to enable the compose glass.

throttleErrorMsg.message: The requested operation cannot be performed at this time. Please try again in 1 minute.
throttleErrorMsg.description: A sentence to display when the requested operation cannot be executed due to throttling.

errorUnableToRenderDialog.description: A sentence describing that the requested operation cannot be completed due to UI problems,

errorUnsupportedAction.description: A sentence describing that the requested operation is not supported.

errorUnableToImportKey.description: A sentence describing that the extension is unable to import the provided key(s).

errorUnableToDecryptVerifyMessage.message: Unable to decrypt or verify message.
errorUnableToDecryptVerifyMessage.description: A sentence describing that the extension is unable to decrypt or verify the message.

dialogSelectAll.description: A fragment indicating to the user to select all items in the dialog.

composeGlassTitle.message: Composing a Yahoo Mail Encrypted message
composeGlassTitle.description: Title of the pageAction when Secure Compose is active.

composeGlassConfirmBack.description: Message asking user to confirm closing the compose glass

composeGlassConfirmRecipients.message:
Unsupported Recipients

$1 do not have keys for now.
composeGlassConfirmRecipients.description: Message warning user that some recipients are missing keys.

composeGlassAddPassphraseForRecipients.message:
Unsupported Recipients

$1 do not have keys for now.

#add#Add a per-message passphrase# for encryption first (TODO: plus a tooltip to guide them through the installation of the Yahoo Mail Encrypted Extension), you'll contact them separately for the chosen passphrase (e.g., by a phone call).
composeGlassAddPassphraseForRecipients.description: Message warning user that some recipients are missing keys.

composeGlassSendUnencryptedMessage.description: Ask user to send the message unencrypted.

conameConnectionError.message: Error connecting to keyserver (requires VPN/corp network).

setupIntroText.message: Do you want to generate new encryption keys?

setupIntroHint.message: Select 'yes' unless you've used End to End before and want to restore your old keys.

setupBackupText.message: Please copy down this backup code in a safe place. You can use it to restore your encryption keys if you ever delete them accidentally.

setupPassphraseText.message: You can set a passphrase on your encryption keys for extra security. Make sure you don't forget it!

setupRestoreText.message: How would you like to restore your keys?

setupPassphraseTutorialText.message: Click 'Lock keyring' in the End to End menu to make your encryption keys inaccessible to others who can access your computer. You'll need your passphrase to unlock the keyring after locking it.

setupTutorialText.message: Here's a short demo of End-to-End in action.

interactionSuppressed.message: To start typing, tap left Ctrl-key. Everything you type will not be encrypted.
interactionSuppressed.description: A sentence explaining that the interaction with the web application is suppressed.

interactionEnabled.message: Everything you type is now unencrypted. Tap left Ctrl-key to reenable secure mode.
interactionEnabled.description: A sentence explaining that the interaction with the web application is enabled.

passphraseIncorrectWarning.description: A message informing the user that passphrase validation failed.

keyUpdateSuccessMsg.message: The keys are now in sync with the server.
keyUpdateSuccessMsg.description: A sentence informing the user that the local keys are in-sync with server.

promptKeepSyncKeysMessage.message:
The local keyring is found inconsistent with the remote keyserver.

You might have just imported a key that is unknown to the keyserver. If this is unexpected, we apologize for the inconvenience as we might have reset the keyserver during the alpha stage, or a recent change (within 5-min) to key registration is still being processed.
promptKeepSyncKeysMessage.description: A sentence asking the user to confirm overriding the conflicts with local keyring.

promptMatchRemoteKeysMessage.message: Some key(s) registered with the following email address is missing.
promptMatchRemoteKeysMessage.description: A sentence recommending the user to import private keys of those publicized ones.

promptAddReplaceKeysConfirmMessage.message: Add a new key in addition to the existing one(s) below?
promptAddReplaceKeysConfirmMessage.description: A sentence asking the user whether to keep existing keys while adding a new one.

promptDeleteKeysConfirmMessage.message: Confirm to remove the following keys?
promptDeleteKeysConfirmMessage.description: A sentence asking the user to confirm deleting keys

promptDeleteLastPublicKeyWarningMessage.message: Your friends can no longer send you encrypted emails after removing all public key.
promptDeleteLastPublicKeyWarningMessage.description: A sentence asking the user to confirm users opting-out the service

promptDeletePrivateKeyWarningMessage.message: Messages encrypted to these private keys can no longer be recovered.
promptDeletePrivateKeyWarningMessage.description: A sentence asking the user to confirm deleting private keys

localOnlyKeysLabel.message: The following keys are present only locally.
localOnlyKeysLabel.description: A sentence informing the user the key synchronization conflicts, particularly the keys that exists only locally.

commonKeysLabel.message: The following keys are common to both local keyring and remote keyserver.
commonKeysLabel.description: A sentence informing the user the key synchronization conflicts, particularly those keys that exists both locally and remotely.

remoteOnlyKeysLabel.message: To read emails encrypted to the following registered key(s), please #import#Import# or Restore the corresponding private key(s).
remoteOnlyKeysLabel.description: A sentence informing the user the key synchronization conflicts, particularly the keys that exists only remotely.

giveUpRemoteKeyCheckboxLabel.message: Take down the remote ones from the public listing (e.g., key lost).
giveUpRemoteKeyCheckboxLabel.description: A sentence informing the user that remote keys will be deleted before proceeding.

replaceKeyCheckboxLabel.message: Replace the existing ones with a new one.
replaceKeyCheckboxLabel.description: A sentence informing the user that existing keys will be deleted before getting a new one.

actionOverwriteRemoteKeys.description: A verb prompting the user to update keyserver with local keyrings.

actionAddNewKey.description: A verb prompting the user to add a new key.

confirmUserSyncKeys.message: Yahoo Mail Encrypted requires your configuration regarding $1. Do it now?
confirmUserSyncKeys.description: A sentence prompting the user to synchronize local keyring with remote keyserver.

promptUnsupportedFormattingLabel.message: Encrypted formatting and attachments not yet supported.
promptUnsupportedFormattingLabel.description: A sentence informing the user formatting is not yet supported.

keyRingDescriptionLabel.message: is ready for use with the following keys:
keyRingDescriptionLabel.description: A sentence greeting the user and introducing the keys that s/he has.
